thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Chao

author: Chao
title: Chao
text:
I just booked my second flight with FlightHub. The first time I booked on the phone because I had never heard of FlightHub and wanted to make sure they were legitimate since I was booking an expensive multi-city flight. The flights all worked out.
This second flight was easier since it was one city and back. I like the ease of finding my flight with the website. I love that telephone help is provided anytime. The fights are also the cheapest I can find.
I screwed up with my booking because I accidentally booked insurance. I did not want it. I noticed I had booked insurance when I saw what my credit card was being charged. I quickly called FlightHub, and the representative was pleasant and removed it for me.
I am so happy I found FlightHub. This is one of the better flight finder sites out there.
